phrase: The 10 will never be reached, as well as man, the technology is constantly evolving.
subtitle: Developer since 2010 working with PHP from beginning and expanding to other languages until now. I'm a dev MONSTER, crazy for challenges, clean coder and heavy gamer.
description:
Degree in system analysis from Faculdade de Ciências Exatas e Tecnológias (FACET) of Centro de Estudos Superiores de Maceió (CESMAC).
Post-degree in Software Engineering from Faculdade de Ciências Exatas e Tecnológias (FACET) of Centro de Estudos Superiores de Maceió (CESMAC).

jobs.tools: Ruby(Rails, RSpec and Capybara), Kanban, MySql, Git
jobs.what: Refactor and make new code to improve performance and new features to system.
jobs.how: Creating many test to try cover the maximun features in the system, improve on code to be more performatic and some times, doing queries on database to improve performance. Use git to developmentt flow, making PRs e doing CodeReview.

jobs.what: Create a framework that provide some functions to attend the basic functionalities of a game.
jobs.how: Using TS and PixiJs, I create a layer of abstraction that simplify the basic functionalities to make anything, like as: how show an button or textfield in game, or still create various state machines.

jobs.tools: HTML5, CSS3, JS, PHP and MySql
jobs.what: Continued development and analysis for web application (OndePlante) that works with PNUD support and seeks to improve the state, regional and national environment by planting trees. Planting trees, keeping data of which tree was planted, who planted, where it was planted and whether it is a tribute.
jobs.how: The system is a monolithic application using the MVC architectural standard, with the back-end done in PHP using Doctrine ORM, MySql database and front-end, Bootstrap (html and css) using SmartTemplate + JQuery and Google Maps.

jobs.tools: HTML5, CSS3, JS(jQuery), PHP(Smarty, Doctrine, Laravel and CodeIgniter), MySql and SOAP/REST
jobs.what: Continuation of development and analysis for web application for public auctions, auctioneers management, auctions and their respective types, with timer for the bids, the only part that is not made by the application is the payment, this is done externally To the system.
jobs.how: Monolithic application using MVC architectural pattern, Backbend made in PHP with a company own ORM, front end using Bootstrap (html and css) with JQuery and MySql as database.

jobs.tools: SCRUM, HTML5, CSS3, JS(jQuery, Angular, Ionic), PHP(Smarty)/Java(Jax-rs, dropwizard)/NodeJs, MySql and SOAP/REST/GraphQl
jobs.what: The main system was based on intelligent tutoring, which helped students to study extra-class, trying to meet the educational styles of our country, for example, Of ENEM.We also had a mobile application, mirror of the main platform for mobile environment.
jobs.how: In the first version of the main system we used SOAP-based webservices and a layered architecture with the backend JAVA without a framework and the use of ontology as a database.The front end consisted of an architecture Also in layers made with Bootstrap (html and css), PHP and JQuery.The second version of the main system has been changed to the REST architectural standard using the Dropwizard framework which uses Hibernate as ORM.The front end has been upgraded to Angular .js + Bootstrap (Html ​​and Scss) but did not have an official version, we kept the Soap communication layer parallel to Rest until the new front end was working.The mobile application was done on Ionic consuming back- End V2 in REST The test management application was built with Dropwizard on the backend and Angle on the front end.Although both backend applications used the same database, the mirror was updated manually, I had the idea of Create a microservice using Node.js, GraphQl and MongoDb to manage the databases, but did not even have a final version. Svn, Git, and Scrum + Trello.

jobs.tools: MVC, HTML5, CSS3, JS(DurandalJS), PHP(Slim/Doctrine), MySql and REST
jobs.what: Development and analysis of an application for vehicle fleet management integrated with GPS system installed in the cars which provided various car status information.
jobs.how: Trello, Git, REST, PHP, Doctrine, Slim, MySql, Google Maps, Durandal.js and Bootstrap (html and css).

jobs.tools: HTML5, CSS3, JS(jQuery), PHP and Postgress
jobs.what: Development and analysis of odontogram module for dental system.
jobs.how: Git, Monolithic, PHP, MySql, Bootstrap (html5 / canvas and css) and JQuery.

jobs.tools: HTML, CSS, JS, PHP and MySql
jobs.what: Web system development and analysis for equipment and event management.
jobs.how: Git, Monolithic, PHP, MySql, Bootstrap (html and css) and JQuery.

jobs.what: Assistance and support for computer and users and creation of small systems that automated internal tasks.
jobs.how: Teamviewer, '.bat' scripting to aid in user support activities and the creation of a small system that automated financial sector tasks such as updating invoices between used systems, using Java for Creation of it.

jobs.what: Cash management, people from the operational sector and creation of visual identity for companies, facades and vehicular fleet.
Refactoring and developing system functionalities for the federal and state government.
jobs.how: Svn, TDD, Java, Hibernate and Oracle.
